info.name: DeviantArt - V7 Folder Buttons
info.description: Turn the Folder Buttons into those from V7. A follow-up to "Folders on the Left". Not compatible "Folders on the Left" family scripts.
info.additionalInfo:
Special circumstance brought me here.
Work on Gallery and Favorite Page.
Work with all themes.
Doesn't work while Log Out

The sheet isn't adaptative and texts can be unreadable depending on background image.

Update
26th March of 2013
-Fixed button in Add Media Tab

8th April of 2023
-Fixed Watcher-Only and Prenium Icons

4th May of 2023
-Fixed bug that hide the arrow for "Latest Deviations" widget on the Profile Page
